price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߛߊ߬ߥߏ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߸ ߡߞߊ߬ߝߏ߬ߟߌ߬ߝߋ߲ ߝߣߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߒ߬ ߓߟߏ߫
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
